at the beginning of your upkeep you may put a verse counter on cardname
at the beginning of your upkeep remove a time counter from cardname if there are no time counters on cardname sacrifice it
at the beginning of your upkeep put a hunger counter on cardname then destroy cardname if it has five or more hunger counters on it
at the beginning of your upkeep put a lore counter on cardname then draw a card for each lore counter on cardname
at the beginning of your upkeep you may put a treasure counter on cardname
at the beginning of your upkeep put a plus n plus n counter on enchanted creature if it attacked or blocked since your last upkeep otherwise remove a plus n plus n counter from it
at the beginning of your upkeep put a plus n plus n counter on enchanted creature
at the beginning of your upkeep put a minus n minus n counter on enchanted creature

at the beginning of your end step double the number of growth counters on cardname then create a n n basecolor and basecolor fractal creature token put x plus n plus n counters on it where x is the number of growth counters on cardname
at the beginning of your upkeep choose one
at the beginning of your upkeep you may put an infection counter on cardname
at the beginning of your upkeep you may put a fungus counter on target nontoken creature
at the beginning of each upkeep put a plague counter on cardname
at the beginning of each upkeep put a strife counter on cardname

at the beginning of your upkeep put a rust counter on each artifact target opponent controls then destroy each artifact with mana value less than or equal to the number of rust counters on it artifacts destroyed this way can't be regenerated
at the beginning of your upkeep sacrifice a creature
at the beginning of your upkeep scry n

at the beginning of your upkeep put a plus n plus n counter on each creature you control if you control a creature with power n or greater then you gain nn life if you control a creature with power nn or greater then you win the game if you control a creature with power nn or greater
at the beginning of your upkeep put a muster counter on cardname then create a n n basecolor and basecolor soldier creature token with haste for each muster counter on cardname
at the beginning of your upkeep you may put a growth counter on cardname
at the beginning of your upkeep put a despair counter on cardname then each player exiles x permanents they control and or cards from their hand where x is the number of despair counters on cardname

at the beginning of your upkeep put a plus n plus n counter on enchanted creature if that creature has three or more plus n plus n counters on it it deals damage equal to its power to its controller then destroy that creature and it can't be regenerated
at the beginning of your end step put a coin counter on another target creature
at the beginning of your upkeep remove a pupa counter from cardname if you can't sacrifice it put a plus n plus n counter on enchanted creature and that creature gains flying
at the beginning of your upkeep you may put a fuse counter on cardname
at the beginning of your upkeep you may put an arrow counter on cardname
at the beginning of your upkeep put a tide counter on cardname
at the beginning of your upkeep put a growth counter on cardname
at the beginning of your upkeep put a time counter on cardname
